subject: Basketball (College)
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: A change that is intended to quicken the pace of men’s college basketball and that has led defensive-minded teams like Temple to score more could go into effect more broadly for the 2015-16 season.
snippet: A change that is intended to quicken the pace of men’s college basketball and that has led defensive-minded teams like Temple to score more could go into effect more broadly for the 2015-16 season.
